name: create_pypi-bbc17c22-7a61-434c-80ff-6458b0527c22
content: import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager; import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy; configuration = repository.createHosted('pypi-bbc17c22-7a61-434c-80ff-6458b0527c22', 'pypi-hosted', BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME, WritePolicy.ALLOW, true); repository.createRepository(configuration);
